radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver demonstrates normal echotexture and echogenicity. There is an echogenic lesion within the right hepatic lobe which measures 0.9 x 0.9 x 0.9 cm, most compatible with a hemangioma. The gallbladder lumen demonstrates small, nonobstructing calculi, with edema surrounding the gallbladder wall and gallbladder wall thickening. There is no intra or extrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation. The visualize portions of the pancreatic head and body are unremarkable.
